Become a Member

Remember the Embers

Squirt's Fire Safety Class

Fun at the Firehouse

Join us on select Saturday mornings for a gallery talk on Denver’s fire history. Learn about the big fires that shaped downtown, the evolution of firefighting tools, apparatus and more!  Registration required but also includes museum admission. 


sign up

Fun at the Firehouse

Squirt's Fire Safety Class

Fun at the Firehouse

Join us at 10 am on the first or third Saturday of each month in 2026 for our story and craft time that always has a fire twist! There is a different book and craft each month through the year. Reservations are required to ensure appropriate supplies.

sign up

Squirt's Fire Safety Class

Squirt's Fire Safety Class

Group Visits and Field Trips

You are never too young to learn fire safety! Join us for a fire safety class designed just for preschool-aged children. You and your child will learn and practice important fire safety behaviors in fun and engaging ways. 

Reservations are required.

sign up

Group Visits and Field Trips

Group Visits and Field Trips

Group Visits and Field Trips

Are you looking to bring a group of people to visit the Denver Firefighters Museum?

Please follow the link below to learn more about Group Visits and Field Trips. Reservations are required for ALL groups before your visit.

learn more

Become a Museum Member!

Group Visits and Field Trips

Become a Museum Member!

Do you visit the Denver Firefighters Museum often? Are you interested in a discount for Museum events and programs? Support the Denver Firefighters Museum by becoming a member today! 

join now

Online Store

Group Visits and Field Trips

Become a Museum Member!

Shop our entire gift shop online! Find shirts for adults and kids, toys, books, challenge coins, patches, and much more.

shop now
